description.value:
Your mines push or pull creatures in a burst of concentrated gravity. When you @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.ccVcznj9KVYHLVaY]{Deploy} a mine, choose one of the following effects for that mine:

Black Hole: When your mines detonate, they pull creatures 5 feet toward the mine (10 feet plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} on a critical failure).

Big Bang: When your mines detonate, they push creatures 5 feet away from the mine in a random direction (10 feet plus knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} on a critical failure).

This is forced movement and does not trigger reactions. If this movement would move a creature into a space it can't occupy, the creature stops moving in the last space it can occupy.
